title: [Health] Insomnia could increase peopleâ€™s risk of type 2 diabetes: a study of over 336,999 adults in UK, showed that people who reported that they often had difficulty getting to sleep or staying asleep had higher blood sugar levels

[Health] Researchers developed a toolbox and an online crowdsourcing platform for analyzing electroencephalography data. The upshot: Mounting data will push brain-computer interfaces, sleep studies, and help diagnose conditions more elusive than epilepsy: major depressive disorder, schizofrenia, autism, etc.
